scenario.name: Basic Sipstone UAC
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[caller]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="" search_in="hdr" check_it="true" header="Contact:" assign_to="dummy,contact" />
<ereg regexp="[:space:]*]*)>;tag=B2B." search_in="hdr" check_it="true" header="To:" assign_to="dummy,dummy" />

scenario.send: ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[caller]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: sipp Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] [last_Record-Route:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

INVITE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[caller]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] CSeq: 2 INVITE Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: sipp Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via[$remote_via_ack] From: <sip:[caller]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>[peer_tag_param] [routes] CSeq: 2 ACK Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: sipp Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK Via[$remote_via] From[$remote_from] To[$remote_to] [last_Call-ID:] CSeq[$remote_cseq] [last_Record-Route:] Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

recv.action:
<ereg regexp="" search_in="hdr" check_it="true" header="Contact:" assign_to="dummy,contact" />
<ereg regexp="[:space:]*]*)>;tag=B2B." search_in="hdr" check_it="true" header="From:" assign_to="dummy,dummy" />
